arm_group.description: Patients treated with Glucobay OD under practical manner

brief_summary.textblock:
The objective of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety under practical use of
      Glucobay OD. A total of 5,000 patients are to be enrolled to the study and assessed during 1
      year observation period.

clinical_study.brief_title: Special Drug Use Investigation of Glucobay OD

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Glucobay OD naive diabetics. patients with at least one of the following conditions:
             Uncontrollable with dietary therapy,exercise cure, diabetes medication, insulin
             therapy.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients who are contraindicated based on the product label

study_pop.textblock:
Glucobay OD naive diabetics. Patients with at least one of the following conditions:
        Uncontrollable with dietary therapy,exercise cure, diabetes medication, insulin therapy.
